verses.text: Van voch t'a skal vavb'en ach vetb'eyum xajanab'il vuuj. Van vik'anq'ue in mirra yet' in perfume, van vab'lan schab'il nok' acanh, van vuk'an in vino yet' in lech, xchi winh. Syalan eb' amigo t'a eb' chavanh: Ex amigo vaanhec, uq'ek ha', uq'ek jantac tze nib'ej, xchi eb'. Syalan ix cob'es:

Vaynac in b'ati, palta pitzan in pixan, ix vab'ani to a winh xajanab'il vuuj tz'avaj t'a puerta: Ach cob'es xajanab'il vuuj, jaquin ochi. Lajan ach icha nok' paramuch, malaj jab'oc a paltail. Te ch'ayan in jolom yuj yal ak'val. Tz'el val jililjoc yal ak'val chi' t'a xil in jolom, xchi winh t'ayin.
Toxo ix viq'uel in pichul, ¿tom ol vak'och junelxo? Toxo ix in b'ic voc, ochtapax pococ t'ay junelxo, xin chi t'a winh.
Ha winh xajanab'il vuuj chi', ix yak'ochta sk'ab' winh t'a yolanil puerta. Ix in q'ue val jucnaj yuj.
Yuj chi' ix in q'ue vaan in jacochta winh. Toxonhej ix el d'ujuljoc mirra t'a in k'ab', ix ochcan t'a spatictac sch'apul puerta.

Ha val yic ix vab'an slolon winh, ijan ix in cham ix vab'i. Ayic ix in jacan puerta t'a winh xajanab'il vuuj chi', manhxo ayoc ek'laj winh. Ix in sayek' winh, majxo chaxlaj winh vuuj. Ix vavtej winh, palta majxo tak'voclaj winh t'ayin.
Ix in ilchajel yuj eb' winh stanhvan chonhab'. Ix in smak'an lajvoc eb' winh. Te chucxonhej ix aj yik'anel in xotil eb' winh stanhvan spuertail chonhab' chi'.
Ex cob'estac aj Jerusalén, aq'ek e ti': Tato tz'ilchaj winh in xajanab'il eyuuj, alec t'a winh to van in cham in naan winh, xin chi t'a eb' ix.

Ix yalan eb' ix cob'estac chi' t'ayin: ¿Tas swach'il winh a xajanab'il chi' t'ayach, ach ix te wach' ilji t'a yichanh eb' ix ix wach' yilji? ¿Tas val swach'il jun winh xajan chi' uuj, yuj chi' tza k'an t'ayonh to scak' co ti'? xchi eb' ix t'ayin.
Ha winh xajanab'il vuuj chi', sac winh, chacvasinac yilji winh, te wach' yilji winh t'a yichanh lajunhe' mil vinac.
Ha sat winh, lajan yet' q'uen oro te wach'. Ha xil sjolom winh colochtac, k'ik' yilji icha nok' joj.
Ha yol sat winh, lajan icha nok' paramuch tzek' t'a titac ha', ichato t'a skal lech tz'achanvi nok', t'a sti' snhajab'il ha ha' chi' tz'em manhan nok'.
Ha spak'ultac sti' winh, icha val junok avb'en b'aj ay anh xumac te wach' sjab'. Ha sti' winh, lajan val icha junok anh xumac te wach' sjab'.
Ha sk'ab' winh, lajan icha junok suyanh q'uen oro ayoch q'uen topacio t'ay. Ha sk'ool winh, icha val q'uen marfil nhululixonhej, te ayoch q'uen zafiro yelvanub'oc.
Ha val yoc winh, lajan val icha chab'oc oy nab'a mármol ayem t'a yib'anh chab'oc yich to nab'a oro te wach'. Lajan yilji winh icha te' k'ute' ay t'a Líbano, to sik'b'ileli.
Ha val slolonel winh syala', te chi' scab'i, te wach'nhej winh t'a smasanil. Icha val chi' yilji winh in xajanab'il chi' ex cob'estac aj Jerusalén, xin chi t'a eb' ix.
